plot: Sabina Guzzanti and her crew interview earthquake victims and experts, unveiling the myth of a perfect management of the emergence. Waste of money, propaganda, alleged corruption are underlined with an open eye on the backstage of a media success story - L'Aquila earthquake management.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Draquila - L'Italia che trema
